name: http-api
description: - Ring + Jetty backend server - JSON api handler + HTML page handler - Hiccup and rendering html - CSS files - Simple vanilla clojurescript example (no additional tools) - Autobuilding cljs->js (no additiona tools, except cljs itself) - Solving server startup with `dev/user.clj` - REPL jacking in with dev profile - Easier server lifecycle management - Adding in shadow-cljs and jacking in with clj&cljs BOTH - Adding Reagent and fetching our API from frontend - Adding Integrant - Small quick notes on repl_sessions and easy deployment
